author: Simon Difford
description: Rye whiskey spice and Angostura bitters offset bourbon's richness and amaretto's sweetness in this complex, dry and boozy after-dinner drink. If you like this, then also consider a Smoked Almond Old Fashioned.
name: Toasted Old Fashioned Godfather
recipeIngredient: 30 ml Straight rye whiskey (100 proof / 50% alc./vol.)

recipeInstructions.text: STIR all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
